"Belloq:
It's a transmitter=
, a radio for speaking to God."

=C2=A0 

<blush>He is working all the time,=
 He waits for people coming into the Kingdom, and they come in one at a tim=
e, so it takes Him forever, the ones that are already in the light He greet=
s them too.=C2=A0 Then ones coming in from lower plains, He greets them, th=
e only thing the lower plains people must do is to bow and repent, letting =
Him know they believe in Him, and what He did, then they must forgive every=
one that has ever hurt them, and then enter in, the light is so bright that=
 it hurts at first, but after they are able to open their eyes, and the lig=
ht softens.=C2=A0 The door is a small archway with a tiny blue lite cross a=
bove it, only one spirit at a time is able to go through.=C2=A0 After Jesus=
 speaks to them a guardian angel comes forward, and takes them into an area=
 where they are able to go over the individual's book of life, then they ar=
e taken to their new home in the light realms, and
 they are given duty's, =
schooling, meet up with loved ones, get to do things like here on earth lik=
e go to concerts, whatever they like to do.=C2=A0 At least this is how it w=
as explained, I am sure if you want to hear His voice, He will talk for you=
.=C2=A0 He has a very nice voice, soft, gentle, yet strong and direct. <s>=
=C2=A0 sf

Thanks Snowfire.
=C2=A0
I know many of y=
ou have made contact with Thomas Edison, and other greats, etc... but has a=
nyone ever tried to make contact with Jesus Christ to ask him questions?
=
=C2=A0
I have thought about this many times, but then what would I ask him =
always sets me back.=C2=A0=C2=A0
=C2=A0
For those of you who have made cont=
act with him, please share what you got, and the types of questions you ask=
ed.
=C2=A0
Thanks
=C2=A0

I ask for Alester Crowley to come forward, he i=
s in lower plains, well, was but, i think now he may have crossed into the =
light as he asked for help, and an Angel told him to "come up"=C2=A0 Take a=
 listen, also inbetween my asking for him, are more Angels signing, "he's h=
ere."
